INTERGRATED SERVICES

Our team of seasoned personnel is committed to delivering tailored solutions,
ensuring you receive the protection and safety you deserve.

Our services supplement Tyeks Security Services core product.

We provide a wide array of services that can be managed professionally by our team, and with a single point of contact. We keep in close contact every step of the way, and our consultants and assists you with any queries that you may have.

Thatâ€™s why every Tyeks Security concierge and customer service officer is trained to deliver security services and customer relations in a professional manner. You can be assured that our well-presented and friendly personnel will meet and greet visitors at your building entrances. Our concierge officers are trained in building awareness (maintenance and facilities management) and will provide a point of contact for directions and information, making a first impression for your business that lasts.

Our concierge and customer service offering includes:

  • Facilities management

  • Customer engagement

  • Safety awareness

  • Partnership with our clients
